About Me

My programming journey...

I have always been a problem solver at heart. Although my professional path has taken many twists and turns — from retail to the hospitality industry where I delivered over the top service at Disney's Grand California Hotel and Spa, to troubleshooting Saas software and payment gateway systems — I've never stopped engaging my passion to help others and solve problems.

As a front-end developer, I use my tenacious attention to detail, my passion for making things, and my mission-driven work ethic to make a difference in people's lives. That's why I’m excited to make a big impact at a high growth company.
